verses.t: The{G1161} first{G1520} day of the week{G3588} cometh{G2064} Mary{G3137} Magdalene{G3588} early{G4404}, when it was{G5607} yet{G2089} dark{G4653}, unto{G1519} the sepulchre{G3588}, and{G2532} seeth{G991} the stone{G3588} taken away{G142} from{G1537} the sepulchre{G3588}.

Then{G3767} she runneth{G5143}, and{G2532} cometh{G2064} to{G4314} Simon{G4613} Peter{G4074}, and{G2532} to{G4314} the other{G243} disciple{G3101}, whom{G3739} Jesus{G3588} loved{G5368}, and{G2532} saith{G3004} unto them{G846}, They have taken away{G142} the Lord{G3588} out of{G1537} the sepulchre{G3588}, and{G2532} we know{G1492} not{G3756} where{G4226} they have laid{G5087} him{G846}.
Peter{G3588} therefore{G3767} went forth{G1831}, and{G2532} that{G3588} other{G243} disciple{G3101}, and{G2532} came{G2064} to{G1519} the sepulchre{G3588}.
So{G1161} they ran{G5143} both{G1417} together{G3674}: and{G2532} the other{G243} disciple{G3101} did outrun{G4390} Peter{G3588}, and{G2532} came{G2064} first{G4413} to{G1519} the sepulchre{G3588}.
And{G2532} he stooping down{G3879}, and looking in, saw{G991} the linen clothes{G3588} lying{G2749}; yet{G3305} went he{G1525} not{G3756} in{G1525}.
Then{G3767} cometh{G2064} Simon{G4613} Peter{G4074} following{G190} him{G846}, and{G2532} went{G1525} into{G1519} the sepulchre{G3588}, and{G2532} seeth{G2334} the linen clothes{G3588} lie{G2749},

And{G2532} the napkin{G3588}, that{G3739} was{G2258} about{G1909} his{G846} head{G3588}, not{G3756} lying{G2749} with{G3326} the linen clothes{G3588}, but{G235} wrapped together{G1794} in{G1519} a place{G5117} by itself{G5565}.
Then{G5119} went in{G1525} also{G2532} that other{G243} disciple{G3101}, which{G3588} came{G2064} first{G4413} to{G1519} the sepulchre{G3588}, and{G2532} he saw{G1492}, and{G2532} believed{G4100}.
For{G1063} as yet{G3764} they knew{G1492} not{G3764} the scripture{G3588}, that{G3754} he{G846} must{G1163} rise again{G450} from{G1537} the dead{G3498}.
Then{G3767} the disciples{G3588} went away{G565} again{G3825} unto{G4314} their own home{G1438}.

But{G1161} Mary{G3137} stood{G2476} without{G1854} at{G4314} the sepulchre{G3588} weeping{G2799}: and{G3767} as{G5613} she wept{G2799}, she stooped down{G3879}, and looked into{G1519} the sepulchre{G3588},

And{G2532} seeth{G2334} two{G1417} angels{G32} in{G1722} white{G3022} sitting{G2516}, the one{G1520} at{G4314} the head{G3588}, and{G2532} the other{G1520} at{G4314} the feet{G3588}, where{G3699} the body{G3588} of Jesus{G3588} had lain{G2749}.

And{G2532} they{G1565} say{G3004} unto her{G846}, Woman{G1135}, why{G5101} weepest thou{G2799}? She saith{G3004} unto them{G846}, Because{G3754} they have taken away{G142} my{G3450} Lord{G3588}, and{G2532} I know{G1492} not{G3756} where{G4226} they have laid{G5087} him{G846}.

And{G2532} when she had{G2036} thus{G5023} said{G2036}, she turned herself{G4762} back{G3694}, and{G2532} saw{G2334} Jesus{G3588} standing{G2476}, and{G2532} knew{G1492} not{G3756} that{G3754} it was{G2076} Jesus{G3588}.

Jesus{G3588} saith{G3004} unto her{G846}, Woman{G1135}, why{G5101} weepest thou{G2799}? whom{G5101} seekest thou{G2212}? She{G1565}, supposing{G1380} him{G3588} to be{G2076} the gardener{G2780}, saith{G3004} unto him{G846}, Sir{G2962}, if{G1487} thou{G4771} have borne{G941} him{G846} hence{G941}, tell{G2036} me{G3427} where{G4226} thou hast laid{G5087} him{G846}, and I{G2504} will take{G142} him{G846} away{G142}.
Jesus{G3588} saith{G3004} unto her{G846}, Mary{G3137}. She turned herself{G4762}, and saith{G3004} unto him{G846}, Rabboni{G4462}; which{G3739} is to say{G3004}, Master{G1320}.

Jesus{G3588} saith{G3004} unto her{G846}, Touch{G680} me{G3450} not{G3361}; for{G1063} I am{G305} not yet{G3768} ascended{G305} to{G4314} my{G3450} Father{G3588}: but{G1161} go{G4198} to{G4314} my{G3450} brethren{G3588}, and{G2532} say{G2036} unto them{G846}, I ascend{G305} unto{G4314} my{G3450} Father{G3588}, and{G2532} your{G5216} Father{G3962}; and{G2532} to my{G3450} God{G2316}, and{G2532} your{G5216} God{G2316}.
Mary{G3137} Magdalene{G3588} came{G2064} and told{G518} the disciples{G3588} that{G3754} she had seen{G3708} the Lord{G3588}, and{G2532} that he had spoken{G2036} these things{G5023} unto her{G846}.

Then{G3767} the same{G1565} day{G3588} at evening{G3798}, being{G5607} the first{G1520} day of the week{G3588}, when{G2532} the doors{G3588} were shut{G2808} where{G3699} the disciples{G3588} were{G2258} assembled{G4863} for{G1223} fear{G3588} of the Jews{G2453}, came{G2064} Jesus{G3588} and{G2532} stood{G2476} in{G1519} the midst{G3319}, and{G2532} saith{G3004} unto them{G846}, Peace{G1515} be unto you{G5213}.

And{G2532} when he had{G5124} so{G5124} said{G2036}, he shewed{G1166} unto them{G846} his hands{G3588} and{G2532} his{G846} side{G3588}. Then{G3767} were{G5463} the disciples{G3588} glad{G5463}, when they saw{G1492} the Lord{G3588}.
Then{G3767} said{G2036} Jesus{G3588} to them{G846} again{G3825}, Peace{G1515} be unto you{G5213}: as{G2531} my Father{G3588} hath sent{G649} me{G3165}, even so{G2504} send I{G3992} you{G5209}.
And{G2532} when he had said{G2036} this{G5124}, he breathed on{G1720} them, and{G2532} saith{G3004} unto them{G846}, Receive ye{G2983} the Holy{G40} Ghost{G4151}:
Whose{G302} soever{G5100} sins{G3588} ye remit{G863}, they are remitted{G863} unto them{G846}; and whose{G302} soever{G5100} sins ye retain{G2902}, they are retained{G2902}.
But{G1161} Thomas{G2381}, one{G1520} of{G1537} the twelve{G1427}, called{G3004} Didymus{G1324}, was{G2258} not{G3756} with{G3326} them{G846} when{G3753} Jesus{G3588} came{G2064}.

The other{G243} disciples{G3101} therefore{G3767} said{G3004} unto him{G846}, We have seen{G3708} the Lord{G3588}. But{G1161} he said{G2036} unto them{G846}, Except{G1437} I shall see{G1492} in{G1722} his{G846} hands{G3588} the print{G3588} of the nails{G3588}, and{G2532} put{G906} my{G3450} finger{G3588} into{G1519} the print{G3588} of the nails{G3588}, and{G2532} thrust{G906} my{G3450} hand{G3588} into{G1519} his{G846} side{G3588}, I will{G4100} not{G3756} believe{G4100}.

And{G2532} after{G3326} eight{G3638} days{G2250} again{G3825} his{G846} disciples{G3588} were{G2258} within{G2080}, and{G2532} Thomas{G2381} with{G3326} them{G846}: then came{G2064} Jesus{G3588}, the doors{G3588} being shut{G2808}, and{G2532} stood{G2476} in{G1519} the midst{G3319}, and{G2532} said{G2036}, Peace{G1515} be unto you{G5213}.

Then{G1534} saith he{G3004} to Thomas{G3588}, Reach{G5342} hither{G5602} thy{G4675} finger{G3588}, and{G2532} behold{G1492} my{G3450} hands{G3588}; and{G2532} reach hither{G5342} thy{G4675} hand{G3588}, and{G2532} thrust{G906} it into{G1519} my{G3450} side{G3588}: and{G2532} be{G1096} not{G3361} faithless{G571}, but{G235} believing{G4103}.
And{G2532} Thomas{G3588} answered{G611} and{G2532} said{G2036} unto him{G846}, My{G3450} Lord{G3588} and{G2532} my{G3450} God{G3588}.

Jesus{G3588} saith{G3004} unto him{G846}, Thomas{G2381}, because{G3754} thou hast seen{G3708} me{G3165}, thou hast believed{G4100}: blessed{G3107} are they that{G3588} have{G1492} not{G3361} seen{G1492}, and{G2532} yet have believed{G4100}.

And{G2532} many{G4183} other{G243} signs{G4592} truly{G3303} did{G4160} Jesus{G3588} in the presence of{G1799} his{G846} disciples{G3588}, which{G3739} are{G2076} not{G3756} written{G1125} in{G1722} this{G5129} book{G3588}:

But{G1161} these{G5023} are written{G1125}, that{G2443} ye might believe{G4100} that{G3754} Jesus{G3588} is{G2076} the Christ{G3588}, the Son{G3588} of God{G3588}; and{G2532} that{G2443} believing{G4100} ye might have{G2192} life{G2222} through{G1722} his{G846} name{G3588}.
